data.text: It is as though wisdom is a woman who has built a big house for herself,
and has slaughtered an animal and cooked the meat,
It is as though then she sent out her servant women to call out from the highest place in the town,
“You people who need to understand more, come in!”
“Come and eat the food that I have prepared,
◄Leave/Go away from► other foolish people, and if you do that, you will continue to live.
If you rebuke someone who will not allow others to correct him, he will insult you.
Do not rebuke someone who will not allow others to ◄correct him/tell him what he has done is wrong►, because he will hate you for doing that.
If you give instruction to wise people, they will become wiser.
If you want to be wise, you must start by revering Yahweh,
If you become wise, you will live many years [DOU].
If you are wise, you are the one who will benefit from it;
They sit at the doors of their houses
and they call out to the men who are passing by,
“You people who need to understand more, come into my house!”
“Just as water which you have stolen tastes very good
But men who go to those women’s houses do not know that those who have gone there are now dead;
